IFileSink Interface Reference
[FILE+ Module]

import "fileplus.idl";

Inheritance diagram for IFileSink:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Abstract interpreter of the data passed from the IFileIn.

The individual methods are called by the IFileIn as callback functions, while the file is read and the data become available.

Definition at line 79 of file fileplus.idl.
